trends: There have been 579 other sightings in New York
There were no other sightings in New York on or around March 18th 2012
Summary: large silver round object in the sky as the sun was going down
divs: Sighting DetailsI was looking out the window, and as the sun was going down, I notice jets streaming in the direction of the sun and the opposite direction. There only a few, but them above the sky line I notice a large silver type object hovering, it appeared large, silver, huge, round and the sun also reflected against it, then is vanished, and reappeared hovering at the same spot, when this occurred, then appeared more and more jets in the sky in all directions as if patrolling the sky in the area where the object appeared, like more that 10-15 jets speeding towards the area where the object was, then in all directions of the immediate area. I stood there amazed at what I was seeing. The object the just vanished as it appeared, as time went by, the jets appeared to dissipate. as if search over, at this time, as the object left, the fly overs at 7:29 pm has stopped. This object, what ever it was created massive fly by jets as if patrolling the sky.
